Package org.noise_planet.noisemodelling.pathfinder.path

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.noise_planet.noisemodelling.pathfinder.path.Scene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoiseEmissionMaker
    public class Scene
extends Object
    Data input for a propagation process (SubEnveloppe of BR_TriGrid).
    Author:
    Nicolas Fortin, Pierre Aumond, Adrien Le Bellec

      • getSourceAttenuation

        public double[] getSourceAttenuation​(int srcIndex,
                                     double[] frequencies,
                                     double phi,
                                     double theta)
        Return directivity attenuation. Default implementation define only omnidirectional sources.
        Parameters:
        srcIndex - Source index in the list sourceGeometries
        frequencies - Frequency in Hertz
        phi - (0 2π) 0 is front
        theta - (-π/2 π/2) 0 is horizontal π is top
        Returns:
        Attenuation in dB

      • isOmnidirectional

        public boolean isOmnidirectional​(int srcIndex)
        Parameters:
        srcIndex - Source index in the list sourceGeometries
        Returns:
        True if the source is omnidirectional and so does not have orientation dependant attenuation.

      • asOctaveBands
